div.h2: CapabilityStatement Consumidor del Repositorio de Biopsia del Ministerio de Salud

ul.li: Supported Formats: json, xml, application/fhir+json, application/fhir+xml
Published by: Unidad de Interoperabilidad - MINSAL

blockquote.p: Any FHIR capability may be 'allowed' by the system unless explicitly marked as 'SHALL NOT'. A few items are marked as MAY in the Implementation Guide to highlight their potential relevance to the use case.

div.p: This CapabilityStatement imports these CapabilityStatements Consumidor del Directorio de Proveedores de Atención Médica, Indice Maestro Paciente: "Cliente Buscador de Datos Demográficos (PDQm)"
div.h3: SHALL Support the Following Implementation Guides

div.p: Este Cliente del Repositorio de Biopsia del Ministerio de Salud permite la busqueda de informes de anatomía patológica y sus resultados.
OAuth2 usando el APIG del Ministerio de Salud para generar Tokens para enviar y acceder al respositorio

ul.li:
Supports the search-systeminteraction described as follows:
Iteracción para realizar busquedas de un informe de biopsia y sus resultados

div.p: Operación para extraer los datos del repositorio de biopsia en formato GraphQL
The summary table lists the resources that are part of this configuration, and for each resource it lists:

ul.li: The interactions supported by each resource (Read, Search, Update, and Create, are always shown, while VRead, Patch, Delete, History on Instance, or History on Type are only present if at least one of the resources has support for them.

li.span: The required, recommended, and some optional search parameters (if any).

ul.li: The operations on the resource (if any)

b.title: GET past versions of resources (vread interaction)
GET all set of resources of the type (search interaction)
PUT a new resource version (update interaction)

tr.td:
Supported Profiles
Perfil de la Morfología y Topología del Tumor

td.a: Perfil de la Cabecera del Documento de Biopsía

tr.td: date, subject, section, type, patient, identifier, period, author, entry, _id, category, status

Supported Profiles
Perfil del Reporte de Anatomía Patológica
code, subject, conclusion, result, based-on, patient, specimen, issued, identifier, performer, _id, category, status
*, DiagnosticReport:based-on, DiagnosticReport:patient, DiagnosticReport:performer, DiagnosticReport:result, DiagnosticReport:specimen, DiagnosticReport:subject

td.a: Perfil de Origen para las Categorías T, N, M (Abstracto)
Perfil de Origen de Todos Los Resultados

tr.td: date, subject, value-concept, focus, has-member, component-code-value-quantity, code-value-quantity, combo-code-value-concept, value-string, identifier, method, value-quantity, combo-value-quantity, code-value-concept, _id, status, combo-data-absent-reason, code, component-data-absent-reason, combo-code-value-quantity, code-value-string, based-on, patient, specimen, component-code, performer, combo-code, component-value-quantity, data-absent-reason, component-code-value-concept, component-value-concept, category, combo-value-concept

*, Observation:based-on, Observation:derived-from, Observation:device, Observation:encounter, Observation:focus, Observation:has-member, Observation:part-of, Observation:patient, Observation:performer, Observation:specimen, Observation:subject

DiagnosticReport:performer, DiagnosticReport:results-interpreter, Observation:focus, Observation:performer, Patient:general-practitioner, ServiceRequest:performer, ServiceRequest:requester, Specimen:collector

Supported Profiles
Perfil de Solicitud de Informe de Anatomía Patológica
code, subject, patient, specimen, requester, identifier, performer, intent, performer-type, category, status
*, ServiceRequest:based-on, ServiceRequest:patient, ServiceRequest:performer, ServiceRequest:requester, ServiceRequest:specimen, ServiceRequest:subject
identifier, bodysite, subject, collected, type, collector, patient, status
